title: There's a swarm of bees near my house now...
body:
My mom and I were outside having coffee and we hear this buzzing sound. We look and there have to be thousands of bees swarming this tree making a new nest. It was pretty cool if I wasn't so terrified. I've been watching from my room which has the perfect view for it.

Wish me luck! I don't like getting stung :(
